CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Requested_ECSR_Transfer_Date__c),
(today() - Kick_Off_Call_Date__c - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Kick_Off_Call_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(Requested_ECSR_Transfer_Date__c - Kick_Off_Call_Date__c - 2*( floor((Requested_ECSR_Transfer_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Kick_Off_Call_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: Implementation # of Days
